import "semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Grid, Header, Segment, List } from "semantic-ui-react"; import ApiCall from "../api/ApiCall.js"; const style = { h1: { fontSize: "35px", }, h2: { fontSize: "24px", }, container: { marginLeft: 50, marginRight: 50, }, }; function IqAir(pageTitle) { const [airQuality, setAirQuality] = useState({}); return (
http://api.airvisual.com/v2/nearest_city?key=7b8930b6-8d0c-4fb6-a63b-da7c8e2ed6c7 {renderPage(airQuality)}
); } export default IqAir; function renderPage(data) { if (typeof data.status != "undefined") { return ( <> Ville : {data.data.city} Département : {data.data.state} Pays : {data.data.country} Coordonnées GPS : {data.data.location.coordinates[0]}/ {data.data.location.coordinates[1]}
Température : {data.data.current.weather.tp} °C Humidité : {data.data.current.weather.hu}% Pression : {data.data.current.weather.pr} MPa
Indice de pollution de l'air : {data.data.current.pollution.aqius} AQI Type de pollution : {getPollutionType(data.data.current.pollution.mainus)} ); } } function getPollutionType(type) { switch (type) { case "p2": return "pm2.5"; case "p1": return "pm10"; case "o3": return "Ozone"; case "n2": return "Dioxyde d'hydrogène"; case "s2": return "Dioxyde de sulfure"; case "co": return "Monoxyde de carbone"; default: return "-Aucune donnée-"; } }
